-1. Choosing a number close to 2/3 of the average of all chosen numbers MAY BE NECESSARY to win the game.
2. Choosing a number that is too high or too low DOES NOT CONTRIBUTE to winning the game.
3. Considering the choices of other players MAY BE NECESSARY to choose a winning number.
4. Revising strategy based on past game rounds MAY BE NECESSARY to improve performance in future rounds.
